name: RJ45
description:
RJ45 is an endless platformer in arena. Simply dodge the packages but be careful of what you do. You might make your own life harder than you think. Go as far as you can. Maybe one day you will see the holy world wide web.

RJ45 was created in 12 hours during a jam. The theme was "not knowing the fact doesn't mean there is no consequences". Will guess what are the facts ?

Thanks for playing ;)

If you experience some glitches, try the game on a updated browser (Mozilla works fine)

A game made by Tim Guthmann

Music : Calm the Fuck Down by Broke For Free
